author: __flcl
content: Hi guys. 4096 epocs as blob availability window is not mentioned in the EIP. But we have "blobs should be deleted after e.g. 30-60 days,". Mind if we clarify? It causes some confusion

author: parithosh
content:
its a CL side definition, so its in the CL spec: https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/blob/36f0bb0ed62b463947fda97f42f8ddebc9565587/specs/deneb/validator.md?plain=1#L185

https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/blob/36f0bb0ed62b463947fda97f42f8ddebc9565587/configs/mainnet.yaml#L148

author: __flcl
content: I see, thanks! But what 30-60 days mean in el spec? Shall we at least replace it with "~18 days"

author: bridge-bot
content: <dannyryan> Agreed that it makes sense to patch the EIP language to be either more accurate or more general (e.g. blobs are maintained by the consensus layer for a set custody period and then can be safely pruned afterward)
